ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: "UNION OF THE SNAKE" Part 2, The arc that will rock the Joes' world continues! The team is crumbling! Between discharges and arrests, what was once America's elite counter-terrorist force is but a fading shadow. Their government has turned its back on them, the Jugglers have moved in for the kill...but a new hope has emerged. His name is General Phillip Rey, and he may be the Joes' last, best hope, whether they like it or not! Meanwhile, Scarlett is determined to free Snake-Eyes from prison?and finds help from a very surprising ally!
ComicInfo.Title: Union Of The Snake (Part 2)
